name: Flockmo
description:
Flockmo is a 2d pixelart platformer puzzle game about a hen who is trying to get their chicks back to the nest. You can use a rope to move some blocks and dig tunnels to quickly move the chicks around. 

Download latest. 
Known bugs: sometimes next level button doesnt work. You can always use the select level, that does work lol.
